messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] DUmbest thing I had to learn in school
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/19/2004 9:51:55 PM Eastern Daylight Time, nishamartin@yahoo.com writes: SO, what  was the dumbest thing you think you had to learn in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/19/2004 9:51:55 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
nishamartin@... writes:

SO, what was the dumbest thing you think you had to learn in school?
For me, I think it was the whole how to diagram all of the parts of
speech in a sentence. I was really good at it, but I still don't know
what purpose it served to be able to put things on a weird little
line. LOL<<<<

I've never diagramed a sentence. My brother (two years behind me) did. I
guess they called that the "New English" <G>


~Kelly







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
